data.comment: The match has started at Gwangju World Cup Stadium.
Throw-in for Seoul in the half of Gwangju.
In the minute 2, Free kick for Seoul in the half of Gwangju.
In Gwangju, Eom Won-sang of Gwangju is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Gwangju.
In the minute 4, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Jong Hyeok Kim awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Gwangju get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seoul's half?
In the minute 5, Jong Hyeok Kim awards Seoul a goal kick.
Free kick Seoul.
Gwangju have a goal kick.
In the minute 7, Seoul awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Willyan for Gwangju is whistled offside.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a Seoul throw-in in Gwangju's half.
In the minute 10, Gwangju are coming forward and Felipe Silva gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Seoul at Gwangju World Cup Stadium.
Free kick for Seoul in their own half.
In the minute 14, Ball goes out of play for a Seoul goal kick.
Throw-in for Seoul close to the penalty box.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a throw-in for Seoul, close to Gwangju's area.
In the minute 16, Goal kick for Gwangju at Gwangju World Cup Stadium.
Eom Won-sang hits the bar! Nearly a goal there for Gwangju.
Gwangju's Willyan is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 19, Felipe Silva gets his shot on target but fails to score for Gwangju.
Throw-in for Gwangju at Gwangju World Cup Stadium.
Seoul to take a throw-in in Gwangju territory.
In the minute 22, Throw-in for Gwangju in their own half.
Seoul have been awarded a corner by Jong Hyeok Kim.
Hwang Hyun-soo (Seoul) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 25, Gwangju have a goal kick.
Throw-in Gwangju.
Throw-in for Gwangju in the half of Seoul.
In the minute 27, It's a goal kick for the home team in Gwangju.
Corner awarded to Gwangju.
Gwangju drives forward and Im Min-hyeok gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 31, Seoul have been awarded a corner by Jong Hyeok Kim.
Jung Han-min's header is off-target for Seoul.
Jong Hyeok Kim awards Gwangju a goal kick.
In the minute 33, Gwangju needs to be cautious. Seoul have an attacking throw-in.
Seoul to take a throw-in in Gwangju territory.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a Seoul throw-in in Gwangju's half.
In the minute 34, Ball goes out of play for a Gwangju goal kick.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Gwangju.
Ball safe as Seoul is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 36, Gwangju awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Seoul goal kick.
In Gwangju Gwangju's Felipe Silva is caught offside.
In the minute 40, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Gwangju a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Seoul pushes forward through Han Seung-gyu, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 42, Seoul have a dangerous throw-in.
Can Seoul get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gwangju's half?
Ball safe as Gwangju is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 44, Throw-in for Gwangju in their own half.
Corner awarded to Seoul.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Gwangju in their own half.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
The first half has been concluded at Gwangju World Cup Stadium.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Can Gwangju get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seoul's half?
Throw-in high up the field for Gwangju in Gwangju.
Gwangju surge into the attack at Gwangju World Cup Stadium but Willyanâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 47, Seoul have a goal kick.
Throw-in Seoul.
Throw-in for Seoul in the half of Gwangju.
In the minute 49, Gwangju awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a Seoul throw-in in Gwangju's half.
Can Seoul capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Gwangju's half?
In the minute 50, Willyan of Gwangju smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Gwangju.
Goal kick for Gwangju at Gwangju World Cup Stadium.
In the minute 56, Free kick Seoul.
The home team replace Du Hyeon-seok with Kim Hyo-gi.
Free kick for Gwangju in their own half.
In the minute 58, The away team have replaced Yang Yu-min with Kim Jin-ya. This is the first substitution made today by Kim Ho-young.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Seoul at Gwangju World Cup Stadium.
In the minute 60, Throw-in high up the field for Gwangju in Gwangju.
Throw-in for Seoul close to the penalty box.
Gwangju awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 61, Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Seoul.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Gwangju in their own half.
Kim Hyo-gi of Gwangju gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 63, It's a goal kick for the away team in Gwangju.
Free kick for Gwangju in their own half.
Can Gwangju capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Seoul's half?
In the minute 64, Felipe Silva of Gwangju is pulled up for offside.
Eom Won-sang for Gwangju gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Jong Hyeok Kim awards Seoul a goal kick.
In the minute 66, Jong Hyeok Kim awards the home team a throw-in.
Gwangju awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Seoul have a goal kick.
In the minute 68, Throw-in for Gwangju in their own half.
Seoul awarded a free kick in their own half.
Seoul have been awarded a corner by Jong Hyeok Kim.
In the minute 70, Seoul to take a throw-in in Gwangju territory.
Yeo Bong-hun is on a sub for Im Min-hyeok for Gwangju.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 71, In Gwangju a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Seoul to take a throw-in in Gwangju territory.
Kim Won-sik is back on the pitch.
Jong Hyeok Kim waits before resuming play because Kim Won-sik for Seoul is still down.
In the minute 74, Park Chu-young is replacing Yun Ju-tae for Seoul at Gwangju World Cup Stadium.
Jong Hyeok Kim blows against Gwangju's Kim Hyo-gi for offside.
In the minute 76, Throw-in Seoul.
Free kick for Gwangju in the half of Seoul.
Goal kick for Seoul at Gwangju World Cup Stadium.
In the minute 78, Jong Hyeok Kim signals a Gwangju throw-in in Seoul's half.
The match at Gwangju World Cup Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Kim Won-sik, who is down injured.
Gwangju's Kim Hyo-gi is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 80, Gwangju push forward at Gwangju World Cup Stadium and Eom Won-sang gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Seoul defence.
Gwangju's Rustamjon Ashurmatov misses with an attempt on goal.
Jong Hyeok Kim awards Seoul a goal kick.
In the minute 80, Kim Won-sik returns to the field for Seoul after picking up a slight injury.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Gwangju in their own half.
Free kick for Seoul in their own half.
In the minute 82, Kim Ho-young (Seoul) is making a third substitution, with Cho Seok-young replacing Han Seung-gyu.
Seoul have been awarded a corner by Jong Hyeok Kim.
Park Jin Seob is making the team's third substitution at Gwangju World Cup Stadium with Kim Ju-kong replacing Eom Won-sang.
In the minute 85, Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Gwangju in their own half.
Important block from the Seoul defence as Kim Hyo-gi fires in a strike for Gwangju.
Corner awarded to Gwangju.
In the minute 86, Ball safe as Gwangju is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Gwangju awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Seoul.
In the minute 87, Throw-in for Seoul in the half of Gwangju.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Seoul.
Gwangju drive upfield and Willyan gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Seoul defender.
Jong Hyeok Kim awards the home team a throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Gwangju.
Willyan (Gwangju) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Seoul defenders.
At Gwangju World Cup Stadium the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Gwangju's Willyan gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Seoul goal kick.
Free kick for Gwangju in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Gwangju.
Jong Hyeok Kim blows to end the match. The final score is 0-0.
